1. Tempo by Hilton New York Times Square is designed for the rhythm of Times Square. The best seats in the house to watch the NYE ball drop. Pictured: A bed near floor-to-ceiling windows overlooks Times Square.‚Å†
‚Å†
2.  The lobby at @TempoTimesSquare, overlooking Times Square. Lobby furniture includes chairs and a coffee table.‚Å†

3. 33 Seaport is an intimate escape nestled in the cobbled streets of Downtown Manhattan‚Äôs historic South Street Seaport. Pictured: One of @33SeaportNYC's outdoor terraces, overlooking the Brooklyn Bridge.‚Å†
‚Å†
4. @HotelAKANomad invites you to experience sophisticated style and residential comfort in the heart of Manhattan‚Äôs Design District. Pictured: A chic lobby and its bar is shown, with designs by renowned architect and designer Piero Lissoni (@pierolissoni)‚Å†
‚Å†
5. Virgin Hotels New York City prides itself on exciting culinary and cocktail offerings with a buzzing social scene. After the fun, kick off your shoes in one of their signature rooms or suites and grab a snack from the SMEG fridge to make yourself at home. Pictured: The hotel lobby bar with barstools.‚Å†
‚Å†
6. A picture featuring the Suite at @VirginHotelsNYC. ‚Å†
‚Å†
7. Delta Hotels New York Times Square is a Marriott hotel in Times Square that features an ideal location and offers easy access to the City's major attractions. Pictured: A hotel bed near floor-to-ceiling windows overlooks Times Square.‚Å†
‚Å†
8. Elevators at @DeltaHotels in New York City featuring the City. ‚Å†
‚Å†
9. @MoxyWilliamsburg is a vibrant and playful hotel and community hub. Their bedrooms are welcoming, cozy, and cleverly designed for efficiency. Pictured: The exterior of the Moxy Hotel. A neon sign reads, "Moxy."‚Å†
